text: There is a new `file_by_id` function you can use to load metadata from files uploaded in File Manager: <https://designers.HubSpot.com/en/docs/hubl/hubl-supported-functions#file-by-id>
I saw it was limited to 10 calls per pageâ€¦ would it not be usable in a loop with several hubdb rows?
How many rows were you planning on using?

> <@U7SL518D6> re: "happy to guest post it to HS blog"
That would be amazing :amazing: DM me once you have it together and I'll help get it up there. I'm sure everyone would love it.

<@UH6SMES78> <@UDARG2NKZ> You could also check out the (brand new) CMS for Developers certification: <http://bit.ly/HubSpot-cms-dev-cert-slack>
